mapper.sql: id, skillName, parentId, rootId, updateTime, createTime, creator, isvalid, useSum
mapper.update: update tbl_skilllibrary set useSum = useSum + 1 where id in ( ${skillIds} )
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_skilllibrary (id, skillName, parentId, rootId, updateTime, createTime, creator, isvalid, useSum ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skillname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rootid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now(), #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1, 0 )

insert into tbl_skilllibrary
id,
skillName,
parentId,
rootId,
updateTime,
createTime,
creator,
isvalid,
useSum,

mapper.update:
update tbl_skilllibrary
skillName = #{skillname,jdbcType=CHAR},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rootId = #{rootid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updateTime = now(),
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isvalid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
useSum = #{usesum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_skilllibrary set skillName = #{skillname,jdbcType=CHAR}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rootId = #{rootid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateTime = now(), createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isvalid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, useSum = #{usesum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
